title: Will ‘Go Big or Go Home’ Team Selections Derail Visma-Lease a Bike at the 2024 Tour de France?
content:
Analysis: How the trend of squads stacking their 2024 Tour rosters with top GC talent could alter the balance of power in July.

Read the full article at Will ‘Go Big or Go Home’ Team Selections Derail Visma-Lease a Bike at the 2024 Tour de France? on Velo.
author: sstokes
